alert.note: Alert for Johnson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 09 at 6:54PM EST until January 13 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt continues. * WHERE...Portions of east central Kentucky, northeast Kentucky and southeast Kentucky, including the following areas, in east central Kentucky, Elliott. In northeast Kentucky, Johnson. In southeast Kentucky, Floyd, Magoffin and Morgan. * WHEN...Until 900 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 651 PM EST, Excessive runoff from 1 to 2 inches of rainfall that fell earlier continues to cause minor flooding of low lying and poor drainage areas. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Paintsville, Prestonsburg, Salyersville, Sandy Hook, Mason, Estill, Martin, Wayland, Allen, Falcon, Niles, Brownlow, Oil Springs, Ballot, Mashfork, Conley, Hargis, Leatha, Wheelersburg and Cyrus.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
